post.body:
"slightly less that $1500"???? WTf!? I still can't afford to buy a keyboard at $1000, or 900.... I hope its more than slightly less. If not then I'm sticking to my Razer Tarantula. Btw, I think they mentioned Razer in there, but they spelled it Razor =/.

I'm not jumping to conclusions on the price, I'm just reacting to what Gizmodo said. And of course they know nothing of what the companies making their keyboards will price them.

This is good news still though. I got so gitty at the OLED keyboard product, but I shot myself when I saw the price. Prices going down is always a good thing.

But like I said, until it gets down to a reasonable price, I'll just stick to my Tarantula. And I'll probably continue to stick to it until Razer themselves push out an OLED keyboard... I'm a Razer fanboy. (They make awesome products, what can I say...)
